trans-unit.source: Defines an area that receives and displays ink strokes.
trans-unit.target: 受け取ってインク ストロークを表示する領域を定義します。

trans-unit.source: An InkCanvas is an element that can be used to receive and display ink input.
trans-unit.target: InkCanvas は、受信し、インク入力の表示に使用できる要素です。

trans-unit.source: This is commonly done through the use of a stylus, which interacts with a digitizer to produce ink strokes using a stylus or a mouse.
trans-unit.target: これは一般的に、スタイラスをデジタイザー スタイラスまたはマウスを使用してインク ストロークを生成するためを使用して実行します。

trans-unit.source: The created strokes are represented as <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> objects, and can be manipulated either programmatically or based on user input.
trans-unit.target: 作成したストロークとして表されます<xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>オブジェクト、でき、プログラムでいずれかの操作や、ユーザー入力に基づいて</xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>。

trans-unit.source: The InkCanvas enables users to modify or delete an existing <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>.
trans-unit.target: InkCanvas により、ユーザーを変更または既存の<xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>。</xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>の削除

trans-unit.source: The InkCanvas can be bound to a data source.
trans-unit.target: InkCanvas は、データ ソースにバインドできます。

trans-unit.source: For example, you can bind the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.Strokes%2A> property to: a base-64, encoded string that contains ink data in Ink Serialized format (ISF); or even to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.Strokes%2A> property of another InkCanvas.
trans-unit.target: たとえば、バインド、<xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.Strokes%2A>プロパティを: インクのインクがシリアル化データ (ISF) の書式を設定しますまたはもを表す base&64; でエンコードされた文字列、<xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.Strokes%2A>別 InkCanvas のプロパティ。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.Strokes%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.Strokes%2A> 。

trans-unit.source: You can also bind properties, such as <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.DefaultDrawingAttributes%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.EditingMode%2A>, to other data sources.
trans-unit.target: などのプロパティをバインドすることもできます<xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.DefaultDrawingAttributes%2A>と<xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.EditingMode%2A>、他のデータ ソース。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.EditingMode%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.DefaultDrawingAttributes%2A> 。

trans-unit.source: This event occurs after the user requests that a selection of strokes and/or elements be moved, but before the change is applied.
trans-unit.target: このイベントは、ユーザーがストロークまたは要素の選択範囲を移動することを要求した後、変更が適用される前に発生します。

trans-unit.source: The event handler receives an argument of type <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasSelectionEditingEventArgs> with two properties: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasSelectionEditingEventArgs.OldRectangle%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasSelectionEditingEventArgs.NewRectangle%2A>.
trans-unit.target: イベント ハンドラーは、型の引数<xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasSelectionEditingEventArgs>の&2; つのプロパティ: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasSelectionEditingEventArgs.OldRectangle%2A> <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasSelectionEditingEventArgs.NewRectangle%2A></xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasSelectionEditingEventArgs.NewRectangle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasSelectionEditingEventArgs.OldRectangle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasSelectionEditingEventArgs> 。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasSelectionEditingEventArgs.OldRectangle%2A> defines the boundaries of the selection before the move and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasSelectionEditingEventArgs.NewRectangle%2A> defines the boundaries of the selection after the move.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasSelectionEditingEventArgs.OldRectangle%2A>移動前に、選択範囲の境界を定義および<xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasSelectionEditingEventArgs.NewRectangle%2A>、移動後に、選択範囲の境界を定義します</xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasSelectionEditingEventArgs.NewRectangle%2A>。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasSelectionEditingEventArgs.OldRectangle%2A>

trans-unit.source: After the change is applied, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.SelectionMoved> event will occur.
trans-unit.target: 変更を適用した後、<xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.SelectionMoved>イベントが発生します</xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.SelectionMoved>。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasSelectionEditingEventArgs.OldRectangle%2A> defines the boundaries of the selection before the resizing operation and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasSelectionEditingEventArgs.NewRectangle%2A> defines the boundaries of the selection after the resizing operation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasSelectionEditingEventArgs.OldRectangle%2A>サイズ変更操作の前に、選択範囲の境界を定義および<xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasSelectionEditingEventArgs.NewRectangle%2A>、サイズ変更操作後に、選択範囲の境界を定義します</xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasSelectionEditingEventArgs.NewRectangle%2A>。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasSelectionEditingEventArgs.OldRectangle%2A>
